reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the collection of personal data and the consent required for sharing data with other parties.
reply.reference: We will collect and process the following (personal) data from you: Personal data directly provided by you. We may collect personal data from you in a variety of ways... Data that is automatically collected. Data that we automatically collect is not personally identifiable to you... URL: https://www.flyyourvision.com/privacy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects technical data, engagement data, activity data, and transaction data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy outlines the specific types of data collected by the app under different categories.
reply.reference: Technical data. We may collect information about the devices you use to access our Services. This includes, but is not limited to, the type of device you use, the IP address of your device, your operating system, application version and your language settings. Engagement data. We may collect information about the way you interact and engage with our Services. Activity data. We may collect information about your activity when using our Services. Transaction data. We may collect information about your transaction data regarding purchases you made through our Services, this includes the date and time you last used the purchased content and its receipt file or purchase token which serve as the verification of your purchase. URL: https://www.flyyourvision.com/privacy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or request deletion of personal data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that users have the right to request deletion of personal data and restrict the processing of personal data, giving them the option to opt out of data collection or request the deletion of their data.
reply.reference: You have the right to request the deletion of your personal data. If granted, subject to certain limitations under applicable law, we will delete the relevant personal data from our and our service provider's possession. Fulfillment of some data deletion requests may prevent you from using our Services and results in the termination of our Services to you. URL: https://www.flyyourvision.com/privacy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties as described in the privacy policy.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app may share personal data with various third parties for specific purposes outlined in the policy.
reply.reference: We may share your personal data with third parties only if this is necessary for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy, legally required, or if you have provided explicit consent beforehand. URL: https://www.flyyourvision.com/privacy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with business affiliates and service providers.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app may share personal data with business affiliates and service providers for specific purposes.
reply.reference: Business affiliates. We may share your personal data with our business affiliates, such as entities under common ownership or control, in which case we will require those entities to honor this Privacy Policy. Service providers. We may share your personal data with selected third parties that support our Services. These data processors include hosting, payment processing, analytics, diagnostics, and email delivery service providers. We authorize these service providers to use your personal data only for providing their services and support functions to us in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Please refer to the corresponding Privacy Policies of these Service providers to learn how they use. URL: https://www.flyyourvision.com/privacy
